TG Apostasy of the Early Christian Church
Behold therefore the goodness and severity of God: on them which fell, severity; but toward thee, goodness, if thou continue in
goodness: otherwise thou also shalt be cut off.
And they also, if they abide not still in unbelief, shall be grafted in: for God is able to graft them in again.
For if thou wert cut out of the olive tree which is wild by nature, and wert grafted contrary to nature into a good olive tree: how much more shall these, which be the natural
be grafted into their own olive tree?
